name: Bee´s Game
description:
A short plataformer shooter made for my friend´s birthday, i am not very expirienced at making games but i did it with love hahah, I put it here so my friends and anyone can play it, try to get to the end and save both friends who are caged!

ps. You move with A and D and jump with W and shoot by clicking.

Se controla con A y D se salta con W y se dispara clickeando el cursor.
